page.title: 13A DAY WITH THE PARKER'S CONT
page.content: After play we all went swimming in the school pool. We had some relay races with just two people in each team.The water was really warm today. Soon it was time to get changed, we put our chairs up, said prayers and went home. When I got in my sister was playing the piano as usual, it sounded awful. I got a drink of apple juice and a biscuit and read a magazine. After dinner I went with my sister to a friend's house to do some baby sitting.We watched T.V. for a while and at 11.30. Mrs Scott came home and she took us home. As it was rather late when we got in I went straight to bed. Goodnight. ZZZZZZZZZzzzzzzzz.......
